tags.name: simple-modal-template
tags.description:
`simple-modal-template`
`A simple modal that ensures accessibility and stack order context appropriately`

Events:

  * `simple-modal-show` {`CustomEvent<{ id: string | null; elements: { header: any; content: any; buttons: any; }; invokedBy: any; modalClass: string | null; styles: {}; clone: boolean; title: string | boolean; }>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `title` {`string`} - the modal title

  * `modal` - the simple-modal

Properties:

  * `title` {`string`} - the modal title

  * `modal` - the simple-modal

attributes.name: title
attributes.description:
`title` {`string`} - the modal title

Property: title

Default:

attributes.name: modal
attributes.description:
`modal` - the simple-modal

Property: modal
